title: Use caution with AI therapy, experts say
description: As artificial intelligence chatbots like ChatGPT have grown in popularity, some are turning to them for therapeutic purposes.
content:

title: CNBC Daily Open: AI is back - it never really went away
description: Investors piled back into artificial intelligence names on Monday stateside. "AI-related stocks should drive equity markets," an analyst said.
content:
Investors piled back into artificial intelligence names on Monday stateside. Shares of Nvidia jumped 5.8%, Broadcom advanced 2.6% and Microsoft climbed 1.9% to end its eight-day losing streak, its longest consecutive decline since 2011.

title: At some Philly doctors’ offices, AI is listening in the exam room
description: So-called ambient listening and AI scribes are now among the artificial intelligence tools that patients are beginning to see in exam rooms.
content:
By Sarah Gantz, The Philadelphia Inquirer (TNS)
Bracken Babula starts patient visits these days by closing the exam room door and asking if they mind him recording their conversation. He hits a button on his mobile phone, checks that it is recording,... [9126 chars]

title: CoreWeave beats third-quarter revenue estimates on AI computing boom
description: (Reuters) -AI cloud provider CoreWeave beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue on Monday, benefiting from surging demand for its computing infrastructure that powers artificial intelligence workloads.
content:

title: Intel CEO to oversee its AI efforts after executive departs for OpenAI
description: SAN FRANCISCO (Reuters) -Intel said on Monday its CEO Lip-Bu Tan would oversee the chipmaker's artificial intelligence efforts after the firm's chief technology officer departed for ChatGPT maker OpenAI.
content:

title: SoftBank's OpenAI wager in focus as analysts upgrade share price target
description: Technology investor SoftBank Group reports second quarter earnings results on Tuesday in the midst of feverish investment in artificial intelligence that has sent its share price soaring.
content:
But SoftBank's belief in AI comes with risks amid growing concern of an "AI bubble" that could see SoftBank overextended in companies at eye-watering valuations, repeating some of its debt-fuelled investment mistakes of the past.
